title: The.Revenant.2015.2160p.UHD.BluRay.FLAC.7.1.x264-NTb
description:
The Revenant 2015 2160p UHD BluRay FLAC 7.1 x264-NTb


This is the first of it`s kind,I personaly want to thank almighty Sabooo for doing all of the hard work,credit and big THX to him for this rip!!!


Source: Lossless video capture of the UHD Blu-ray, The.Revenant.2015.1080p.Blu-ray.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.7.1-BAKED for everything other than the video
Video: 23.976fps 3840x1606 x264 34226 kbps
Audio: English FLAC 7.1 3990 kbps
Subtitles: English (Foreign Hardcoded), English, English SDH

Sabooo wrote:
Forced subtitles could not be turned off, so they are present in the capture. I figured its not that big of a deal since probably noone actually speaks that language and will need them.

The UHD Blu-ray shows much more range (HDR hype). HD Blu-ray is way too bright and lacks saturation. On the downside, there are various parts that some would consider crushed blacks. Overall I and the people I asked find the UHD Blu-ray vastly superior. Additionally, some scenes show different framing, which indicates a different master
